data.text: A patient has bilateral ear infections. What does that mean?
choices: The patient has an infection in the right ear.
The patient has an infection in both ears.
The patient has an infection in the left ear.
The patient has an infection around the left ear.
data.answer: The patient has an infection in both ears.

data.text: If a patient is reported to have bradycardia. What does this tell you?
choices: The patient has slow intestinal digestion.
The patient has a slow heartbeat.
The patient has hypermotility of the stomach.
The patient has a fast heartbeat.
data.answer: The patient has a slow heartbeat.
